item.title: Queue - Implement k queues in an array
item.description: Create a data structure kQueues that represents k queues. Implementation of kQueues should use only one array, i.e., k queues should use the same array for storing elements. Following functions must be supported by kQueues. enqueue(int x, int qn) –> adds x to queue number ‘qn’ where qn is from 0 to k-1 dequeue(int qn) –> deletes an element from queue number ‘qn’ where qn is from 0 to k-1 METHOD 1
